TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ClaimsPrincipalPermissionAttribute extends System.Security.Permissions.CodeAccessSecurityAttribute
Public NotInheritable Class ClaimsPrincipalPermissionAttribute Inherits CodeAccessSecurityAttribute

summary.span: 表示在目前應用程式內容中，用來根據執行個體提供之邏輯宣告指派存取檢查的安全性屬性。

span.span: Represents a security attribute used to declaratively assign access checks based on the logic provided by the instance in the current application context.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 可用來以宣告方式要求使用已設定的存取檢查。The is used to declaratively request an access check using the configured . 您必須指定其中一個值，`Resource`並`Operation`中您宣告。You must specify one of the values, a `Resource` and an `Operation` in your declaration. `Resource`並`Operation`屬性指定的資源和動作為其目前的主體 () 必須有授權，才能繼續執行。The `Resource` and `Operation` properties specify the resource and action for which the current principal () must be authorized for execution to proceed. 如果目前的主體未獲授權在指定的資源上執行指定的動作 （作業）就會擲回。If the current principal is not authorized to perform the specified action (operation) on the specified resource, a is thrown. > [!IMPORTANT] > 類別會使用宣告授權管理員來設定下方設定屬性。The class uses the claims authorization manager configured by the that is set under the property. 這是在所有情況下，甚至是在其中未使用 WS-同盟; 的情況下，則為 true例如，作用中 (WCF) Web 應用程式和主控台應用程式。This is true in all cases, even in scenarios where WS-Federation is not used; for example, active (WCF) Web applications and Console applications. 您可以指定宣告授權管理員在設定或以程式設計的方式。You can specify the claims authorization manager either in configuration or programmatically. 若要指定組態檔中的宣告授權管理員，設定[ <claimsAuthorizationManager> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/claimsauthorizationmanager.md)項目底下[ <identityConfiguration>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/identityconfiguration.md)項目，並確定這個身分識別組態由參考[ <Federationconfiguration>> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/federationconfiguration.md)由執行階段載入的項目 （例如，藉由設定`identityConfigurationName`屬性)。To specify the claims authorization manager in a configuration file, set the [<claimsAuthorizationManager>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/claimsauthorizationmanager.md) element under an [<identityConfiguration>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/identityconfiguration.md) element and ensure that this identity configuration is referenced by the [<federationConfiguration>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/federationconfiguration.md) element that is loaded by the runtime (for example, by setting the `identityConfigurationName` attribute). 若要以程式設計方式設定宣告授權管理員，提供的處理常式事件。To set the claims authorization manager programmatically, provide a handler for the event. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何保護方法裝飾具有屬性。The following example shows how to protect a method by decorating it with the attribute. 屬性會評估是否應該授與存取目前主體利用所提供的邏輯應用程式內容中的執行個體。The attribute will evaluate whether access should be granted to the current principal by leveraging the logic provided by the instance in the application context. 如果指定的動作，對指定的資源，未授權目前主體擲回，否則繼續執行。If the current principal is not authorized for the specified action on the specified resource, a is thrown; otherwise, execution proceeds. [!code-csharp[WifCppWithCam#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/wifcppwithcam/cs/wifcppwithcam/program.cs#4)] 下列 XML 說明使用自訂宣告授權所需的最低設定管理員類別。The following XML shows the minimum configuration required to use a custom claims authorization manager with the class. 您必須至少宣告同時`system.identityModel`而`system.identityModel.services`區段中``項目，然後指定您的授權管理員中[ <claimsAuthorizationManager> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/claimsauthorizationmanager.md)下的預設身分識別組態項目。You must, at a minimum, declare both the `system.identityModel` and the `system.identityModel.services` sections in the `` element and then specify your authorization manager in a [<claimsAuthorizationManager>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/claimsauthorizationmanager.md) element under the default identity configuration. 這可確保您的授權管理員從預設的同盟組態參考。This will ensure that your authorization manager is referenced from the default federation configuration. 或者，您可以在其中指定所在中指定授權管理員的身分識別組態的名稱`identityConfigurationName`的屬性[ <Federationconfiguration>> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/federationconfiguration.md)項目。Alternatively, you can specify the name of the identity configuration under which your authorization manager is specified in the `identityConfigurationName` attribute of the [<federationConfiguration>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/federationconfiguration.md) element. ```xml
```

param.span: 其中一個 值，這個值指定可以在使用宣告式安全性時執行的安全性動作。

span.span: One of the values that specifies the security actions that can be performed when using declarative security.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您也必須指定`Operation`並`Resource`屬性中的您宣告或例外狀況會擲回時方法會叫用來建立權限。You must also specify the `Operation` and `Resource` properties in your declaration or an exception will be thrown when the method is invoked to create the permission.

summary.span: 建立以目前執行個體為基礎的 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Creates new instance of the class that is based on the current instance.

returns.span: 對於作業及與此執行個體關聯之資源的 。

span.span: A with the operation and resource associated with this instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 物件使用的值來建立屬性和屬性。The object is created by using the value of the property and the property. 您必須指定`Operation`並`Resource`屬性中的您宣告或例外狀況會擲回時方法會叫用來建立權限。You must specify the `Operation` and `Resource` properties in your declaration or an exception will be thrown when the method is invoked to create the permission.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Operation { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Operation : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定目前主體應該獲得指定資源之授權的作業。

span.span: Gets or sets the operation for which the current principal should be authorized on the specified resource.

value.span: 應授權目前主體的動作。

span.span: The action for which the current principal should be authorized.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 作業是目前主體應該授權在指定的資源的動作。The operation is the action for which the current principal should be authorized on the specified resource. 您必須設定`Operation`屬性，在您宣告或例外狀況會擲回時呼叫方法來建立權限。You must set the `Operation` property in your declaration or an exception will be thrown when the method is called to create the permission.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Resource { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Resource : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定資源，主體應該獲得其授權，才能執行指定的動作 (作業)。

span.span: Gets or sets the resource on which the principal should be authorized to perform the specified action (operation).

value.span: 其目前主體應該要授權的資源。

span.span: The resource on which the current principal should be authorized.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 其目前的主體應該要授權來執行指定的動作資源。The resource on which the current principal should be authorized to perform the specified action. 您必須設定`Resource`屬性，在您宣告或例外狀況會擲回時呼叫方法來建立權限。You must set the `Resource` property in your declaration or an exception will be thrown when the method is called to create the permission.
